title: Case-Based Instructional Design Analysis Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Instructional Design Theories and Language Education Experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service/in-service teachers. Analyzes real-world language education cases and emphasizes collaborative problem-solving for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze instructional design problems encountered in real language education settings using case-based approaches.
Learners can systematically derive instructional design solutions through small-group collaboration.
Learners can effectively present design outcomes and incorporate feedback using digital tools like VoiceThread.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
